com.bwsoft.iris.message

Interface Group

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Field, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Message
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SBEMessage

    public interface Group
extends Field
    A group is a special field that contains other fields and/or nested groups. A message is a group without parent.
    Author:
    yzhou

    • Method Summary

        Returns:

      • addField

        Field addField(short id,
               FieldType type,
               short arrayLength)
        The factory class to add a field to this group. It returns the added Field object for the application to further modify its attributes. id and name have to be unique among direct children of this group. The field is considered to be an array by default. If not, specify the arrayLength to be 1.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the field
        type - the type of this field. See available types in FieldType.
        arrayLength - the array size of this field
        Returns:
        the newly created field

      • length

        default short length()
        Specified by:
        length in interface Field
        Returns:
        the length, aka the dimension, of the field
